data.message:
hello facebook, i have problem with my video upload...and i already reported since JANUARY and until now MAC the problem still exist !!!
i can't upload any of my video 2months ago 😞 
please help me to fix the problem, thank you so much !!!

replies.message: Hi, TeRo. If you're having trouble uploading videos, check the following: http://bit.ly/2nAy9uE. -Rhea

Facebook Facebook Page Appeal: 133972736614875. I've read through the policies and also my previous posts and still do not know which posts violates unauthorized commercial communications or spams. If you will, can you point out which posts are violated and if there's any chance of recovering my Page. It's been 24 months since it's unpublished, would be really appreciated if my Page can be restored again, thank you!!
